Towards the end of 1956, Mr. Daniel Grant, an Employee Relations Officer of Rolls-Royce Ltd. and a member of the Workers'Educational Association, submitted to the Lord Provost of Glasgow, Dr. an enquiry he had made into the problems that beset older workers and the effects of retirement upon them.
